text.content: Introduction

rich_text.plain_text: Introduction

text.content: In a hybrid work environment, document creation and collaboration are key components of workflow. Zoom has accumulated rich data through meetings, conversations, and collaborative resources, and Zoom Docs AI can transform this into high-value content creation, delivering a seamless and efficient collaboration experience.

rich_text.plain_text: In a hybrid work environment, document creation and collaboration are key components of workflow. Zoom has accumulated rich data through meetings, conversations, and collaborative resources, and Zoom Docs AI can transform this into high-value content creation, delivering a seamless and efficient collaboration experience.

text.content: User scenario

rich_text.plain_text: User scenario

text.content: In collaborative document scenarios, which tasks can be automated with AI to help users complete work faster and better? We explored this from two directions:

rich_text.plain_text: In collaborative document scenarios, which tasks can be automated with AI to help users complete work faster and better? We explored this from two directions:

text.content: From a user-centric perspective:

rich_text.plain_text: From a user-centric perspective:

text.content: Through user interviews, research, and Jobs-To-Be-Done process analysis, we identified which document collaboration tasks are currently time-consuming, yield unsatisfactory results, or are complex;

rich_text.plain_text: Through user interviews, research, and Jobs-To-Be-Done process analysis, we identified which document collaboration tasks are currently time-consuming, yield unsatisfactory results, or are complex;

text.content: From an AI technology perspective:

rich_text.plain_text: From an AI technology perspective:

text.content: Understanding current AI capabilities, what tasks it excels at, precisely defining the boundaries of AI capabilities, and discovering the application scenarios that best solve problems.

rich_text.plain_text: Understanding current AI capabilities, what tasks it excels at, precisely defining the boundaries of AI capabilities, and discovering the application scenarios that best solve problems.

text.content: We identified a series of high-value scenarios that improve task efficiency and quality:

rich_text.plain_text: We identified a series of high-value scenarios that improve task efficiency and quality:

text.content: Explorations

rich_text.plain_text: Explorations

text.content: Thinking

rich_text.plain_text: Thinking

text.content: What problems do average users face when collaborating with AI document tools?

rich_text.plain_text: What problems do average users face when collaborating with AI document tools?

text.content: After user research and discussions, we discovered the following issues:

rich_text.plain_text: After user research and discussions, we discovered the following issues:

text.content: Overall, users typically lack confidence and efficient methods regarding AI tools' capability boundaries, communication methods, and result control.

rich_text.plain_text: Overall, users typically lack confidence and efficient methods regarding AI tools' capability boundaries, communication methods, and result control.

text.content: Goals

rich_text.plain_text: Goals

text.content: "Help ordinary people improve the efficiency and quality of document creation and reading"

rich_text.plain_text: "Help ordinary people improve the efficiency and quality of document creation and reading"

text.content: AI UX structure exploration

rich_text.plain_text: AI UX structure exploration

text.content: We can imagine user collaboration with AI as similar to working with an assistant in our daily work, where our needs vary in different scenarios:

rich_text.plain_text: We can imagine user collaboration with AI as similar to working with an assistant in our daily work, where our needs vary in different scenarios:

text.content: Sometimes we need the assistant to proactively identify issues and alert us;

rich_text.plain_text: Sometimes we need the assistant to proactively identify issues and alert us;

text.content: Sometimes we just need the assistant to help with a simple, clearly defined task that can be completed with minimal instruction;

rich_text.plain_text: Sometimes we just need the assistant to help with a simple, clearly defined task that can be completed with minimal instruction;

text.content: Some complex tasks require in-depth communication with the assistant and collaborative refinement of results until satisfaction.

rich_text.plain_text: Some complex tasks require in-depth communication with the assistant and collaborative refinement of results until satisfaction.

text.content: Therefore, from the perspective of "AI-user interaction modes," I've categorized the interaction patterns needed in common scenarios into roughly three types:

rich_text.plain_text: Therefore, from the perspective of "AI-user interaction modes," I've categorized the interaction patterns needed in common scenarios into roughly three types:

text.content: These three interaction modes can be used in combination to flexibly meet user needs

rich_text.plain_text: These three interaction modes can be used in combination to flexibly meet user needs

text.content: üëâüèª Selection preferences

rich_text.plain_text: üëâüèª Selection preferences

text.content: When the scenario risk is low and AI completion quality is good, prioritize more automated approaches to improve efficiency;

rich_text.plain_text: When the scenario risk is low and AI completion quality is good, prioritize more automated approaches to improve efficiency;

text.content: Try to use familiar touchpoints or interaction methods to reduce the learning curve;

rich_text.plain_text: Try to use familiar touchpoints or interaction methods to reduce the learning curve;

text.content: Ensure users retain sufficient control, supporting their ability to reject AI help at any time and regain manual control whenever desired.

rich_text.plain_text: Ensure users retain sufficient control, supporting their ability to reject AI help at any time and regain manual control whenever desired.

text.content: Solution

rich_text.plain_text: Solution

text.content: To address user needs and task characteristics in different scenarios, we built these specific AI-driven tools to help users:

rich_text.plain_text: To address user needs and task characteristics in different scenarios, we built these specific AI-driven tools to help users:

text.content: This project primarily introduces the Contextual AI Tools - flexible AI toolsets around target objects, while the independent Ask AI Companion is detailed in

rich_text.plain_text: This project primarily introduces the Contextual AI Tools - flexible AI toolsets around target objects, while the independent Ask AI Companion is detailed in

rich_text.plain_text: Advantages of contextual AI tools:

rich_text.plain_text: Lightweight, flexible, and unobtrusive;

text.content: Specific scenario designs

rich_text.plain_text: Specific scenario designs

text.content: Zoom Docs' Contextual AI tools accompany users throughout the entire document creation and collaboration process.

rich_text.plain_text: Zoom Docs' Contextual AI tools accompany users throughout the entire document creation and collaboration process.

text.content: From initial suggestions on blank pages to referencing meeting records for content generation, to assisting with content iteration and optimization, inserting meeting data, instant translation of foreign language content during collaboration, automatic grammar checking, and more:

rich_text.plain_text: From initial suggestions on blank pages to referencing meeting records for content generation, to assisting with content iteration and optimization, inserting meeting data, instant translation of foreign language content during collaboration, automatic grammar checking, and more:

text.content: 1. Starting from scratch

rich_text.plain_text: 1. Starting from scratch

text.content: During the draft ideation stage, the AI assistant provides possible next steps based on the title, helping users take the first step, find potentially valuable related information, and incorporate new perspectives

rich_text.plain_text: During the draft ideation stage, the AI assistant provides possible next steps based on the title, helping users take the first step, find potentially valuable related information, and incorporate new perspectives

text.content: Default guidance

rich_text.plain_text: Default guidance

text.content: In the default AI command line, preset prompts for common scenarios are grouped and displayed horizontally as buttons:

rich_text.plain_text: In the default AI command line, preset prompts for common scenarios are grouped and displayed horizontally as buttons:

text.content: This saves interface space while making it more familiar to users and easier to remember locations. Compared to the list format used by other AI document tools, this approach may be more intuitive and user-friendly for average users

rich_text.plain_text: This saves interface space while making it more familiar to users and easier to remember locations. Compared to the list format used by other AI document tools, this approach may be more intuitive and user-friendly for average users

text.content: Input and generation

rich_text.plain_text: Input and generation

text.content: During user intent input, the system automatically searches for matching preset prompts, allowing users to navigate with arrow keys or select suitable options directly with the mouse, improving input efficiency and reducing language organization difficulty

rich_text.plain_text: During user intent input, the system automatically searches for matching preset prompts, allowing users to navigate with arrow keys or select suitable options directly with the mouse, improving input efficiency and reducing language organization difficulty

text.content: Result review

rich_text.plain_text: Result review

text.content: Users can accept, reject, or continue collaborating with AI to modify results

rich_text.plain_text: Users can accept, reject, or continue collaborating with AI to modify results

text.content: When users feel results don't meet expectations because their initial request description was problematic, they can directly modify the original prompt to regenerate content. They can also switch between multiple results to compare and choose, and regenerate results by manually inputting or quickly selecting a common modification direction

rich_text.plain_text: When users feel results don't meet expectations because their initial request description was problematic, they can directly modify the original prompt to regenerate content. They can also switch between multiple results to compare and choose, and regenerate results by manually inputting or quickly selecting a common modification direction

text.content: 2. Generating from meetings

rich_text.plain_text: 2. Generating from meetings

text.content: Through Zoom Docs AI, users can choose to reference content from a specific meeting as context for AI-generated content:

rich_text.plain_text: Through Zoom Docs AI, users can choose to reference content from a specific meeting as context for AI-generated content:

text.content: Daily grouping and calendar quick navigation help users rapidly find target meetings;

rich_text.plain_text: Daily grouping and calendar quick navigation help users rapidly find target meetings;

text.content: Hovering over meeting cards quickly previews meeting summaries, helping users confirm "Yes, this is the meeting I want to reference."

rich_text.plain_text: Hovering over meeting cards quickly previews meeting summaries, helping users confirm "Yes, this is the meeting I want to reference."

text.content: 3. AI-assisted content optimization and understanding

rich_text.plain_text: 3. AI-assisted content optimization and understanding

text.content: For documents with existing content, AI can help users enhance and polish specific sections or the entire document, clarify existing content through summaries and explanations, and translate content into different languages.

rich_text.plain_text: For documents with existing content, AI can help users enhance and polish specific sections or the entire document, clarify existing content through summaries and explanations, and translate content into different languages.

text.content: 4. Inserting meeting data

rich_text.plain_text: 4. Inserting meeting data

text.content: Want to synchronize conclusions from a specific meeting in a document? AI can help directly insert meeting summaries or next steps

rich_text.plain_text: Want to synchronize conclusions from a specific meeting in a document? AI can help directly insert meeting summaries or next steps

text.content: 5. Instant translation

rich_text.plain_text: 5. Instant translation

text.content: In multilingual team document collaboration, when members don't understand certain foreign language content, using global translation can be cumbersome and may cause confusion between continuously updated document content and translated content.

rich_text.plain_text: In multilingual team document collaboration, when members don't understand certain foreign language content, using global translation can be cumbersome and may cause confusion between continuously updated document content and translated content.

text.content: For this reason, we designed the Instant translate feature, which helps users see translations of content segments simply and immediately without affecting the original display:

rich_text.plain_text: For this reason, we designed the Instant translate feature, which helps users see translations of content segments simply and immediately without affecting the original display:

text.content: Hold Shift + move the mouse over a paragraph to see the translated content beside it;

rich_text.plain_text: Hold Shift + move the mouse over a paragraph to see the translated content beside it;

text.content: Hold Shift while moving the mouse between paragraphs to continuously translate different sections.

rich_text.plain_text: Hold Shift while moving the mouse between paragraphs to continuously translate different sections.

text.content: 6. Automatic error correction

rich_text.plain_text: 6. Automatic error correction

text.content: Spelling and grammar check

rich_text.plain_text: Spelling and grammar check

text.content: When AI detects spelling errors, grammar issues, or areas where wording can be improved, it proactively offers suggestions (currently only supporting grammar and spelling corrections, with more types to be expanded in the future)

rich_text.plain_text: When AI detects spelling errors, grammar issues, or areas where wording can be improved, it proactively offers suggestions (currently only supporting grammar and spelling corrections, with more types to be expanded in the future)

text.content: Users can choose to accept or ignore AI suggestions, and also provide feedback on the quality of AI recommendations

rich_text.plain_text: Users can choose to accept or ignore AI suggestions, and also provide feedback on the quality of AI recommendations

text.content: 7. Safety and control

rich_text.plain_text: 7. Safety and control

text.content: Clear notification and confirmation before enabling AI

rich_text.plain_text: Clear notification and confirmation before enabling AI

text.content: Providing feature toggles that allow users to fully control the activation status of each AI function, avoiding proactive suggestions that might disturb users

rich_text.plain_text: Providing feature toggles that allow users to fully control the activation status of each AI function, avoiding proactive suggestions that might disturb users

text.content: Marking AI-generated results to help users maintain independent judgment

rich_text.plain_text: Marking AI-generated results to help users maintain independent judgment

text.content: More exploration

rich_text.plain_text: More exploration

text.content: What if AI results aren't usable? -- Phased automation

rich_text.plain_text: What if AI results aren't usable? -- Phased automation

text.content: Our everyday work document creation is often a process from rough to refined, with goal conceptualization and continuous refinement of milestone or partial results.

rich_text.plain_text: Our everyday work document creation is often a process from rough to refined, with goal conceptualization and continuous refinement of milestone or partial results.

text.content: In current AI generation products, it's most common to use just a single prompt from the user as input for AI to generate content. For high-quality requirements in actual work scenarios, such results are often unusable, and users may spend significant time repeatedly adjusting results.

rich_text.plain_text: In current AI generation products, it's most common to use just a single prompt from the user as input for AI to generate content. For high-quality requirements in actual work scenarios, such results are often unusable, and users may spend significant time repeatedly adjusting results.

text.content: To address this problem, we've tried to integrate more detailed creation processes into document co-creation with AI, allowing users to selectively supervise automation of high-requirement tasks:

rich_text.plain_text: To address this problem, we've tried to integrate more detailed creation processes into document co-creation with AI, allowing users to selectively supervise automation of high-requirement tasks:

text.content: Topic ‚Üí Outline ‚Üí Paragraph / Content ‚Üí Whole page

rich_text.plain_text: Topic ‚Üí Outline ‚Üí Paragraph / Content ‚Üí Whole page

text.content: Before AI generates a document, we add human review and calibration points at the structure and paragraph stages, allowing users to better control the creative direction and get more suitable results; for tasks that don't require as much control, users can also skip the supervision process and generate directly.

rich_text.plain_text: Before AI generates a document, we add human review and calibration points at the structure and paragraph stages, allowing users to better control the creative direction and get more suitable results; for tasks that don't require as much control, users can also skip the supervision process and generate directly.

text.content: How to quickly complete common tasks? -- "My favorite prompts"

rich_text.plain_text: How to quickly complete common tasks? -- "My favorite prompts"

text.content: Some tasks are repeatedly performed in daily work, and different users have different writing habits, styles, and special scenario needs that are difficult to quickly satisfy with generic "intent descriptions" or "preset prompts."

rich_text.plain_text: Some tasks are repeatedly performed in daily work, and different users have different writing habits, styles, and special scenario needs that are difficult to quickly satisfy with generic "intent descriptions" or "preset prompts."

text.content: Saving personalized "My favorite prompts" makes it convenient for users to quickly access them, while also supporting easy sharing or reuse with other members or teams.

rich_text.plain_text: Saving personalized "My favorite prompts" makes it convenient for users to quickly access them, while also supporting easy sharing or reuse with other members or teams.
